systemStatus: Session 4 complete. Dashboard working. Ready to begin Session 5.

1.title: Environment Setup and First CLI Application
1.summary: Built task-tracker CLI with Node.js. Learned CLAUDE.md context files. Established 'unicycle before flaming swords' principle.

2.title: Git Workflows & CSMLS Foundation
2.summary: Learned Git basics (init, add, commit, push). Created GitHub repo. Planned CSMLS architecture. Passed Git Workflows quality gate.

3.title: Install Compound Engineering Plugin & Plan CSMLS V1
3.summary: Installed plugin from marketplace. Used /workflows:brainstorm and /workflows:plan with parallel agents. Generated comprehensive CSMLS implementation plan. Practiced Git branching hands-on.

4.title: Build CSMLS V1 Meta-Learning System with Parallel Agents
4.summary: Used /workflows:work to build React dashboard. 25+ files created by parallel agents in 10 mins. Hit token limits, recovered next day. Fixed data sync issues, validated dashboard working, created emergency protocols.
lessonsLearned: Plugin workflows are atomic - cannot pause/resume
File-first architecture requires data sync management

plannedObjectives: Create knowledge patterns for future sessions
